languages.text: "Я знаю. Когда я рядом, то слышу песнь, выстукиваемую твоим сердцем — она складывается в мое имя". {n}Закрыв глаза и счастливо улыбнувшись, Джай говорит словно бы в никуда:{/n} "Хорошо, что теперь всем все ясно".

"I know. When you're near, I can hear the song your heart is beating, and that song carries my name." {n}With a blissful smile, Jae closes her eyes and says seemingly to no one in particular,{/n} "It's good that everything has been cleared up."
languages.original_text: "Я знаю. Когда я рядом, то слышу песнь, выстукиваемую твоим сердцем — она складывается в мое имя". {n}Закрыв глаза и счастливо улыбнувшись, Джай говорит словно бы в никуда:{/n} "Хорошо, что теперь всем все ясно".

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I know. When you're near, I can hear the song your heart is beating, and that song carries my name." {n}With a blissful smile, Jae closes her eyes and says seemingly to no one in particular,{/n} "It's good that everything has been cleared up."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「分かるんだ。{name}様が近くにいると、その胸の鼓動の歌が聴こえるのさ。で、その歌はあたしの名前を歌ってる」{n}幸せそうな笑顔で、ジェイは目を閉じ、誰に聞かせるでもなく、独り言のように言う。{/n}「すべてうまくいって良かったよ」
languages.original_text: "I know. When you're near, I can hear the song your heart is beating, and that song carries my name." {n}With a blissful smile, Jae closes her eyes and says seemingly to no one in particular,{/n} "It's good that everything has been cleared up."

traits.locale_text: 「分かるんだ。{name}様が近くにいると、その胸の鼓動の歌が聴こえるのさ。で、その歌はあたしの名前を歌ってる」{n}幸せそうな笑顔で、ジェイは目を閉じ、誰に聞かせるでもなく、独り言のように言う。{/n}「すべてうまくいって良かったよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我明白的。当你走来的时候，我能听到你的心在唱歌，它唱的是我的名字。”{n}婕伊带着幸福的微笑，闭上了眼睛。随后，她继续开了口，似乎并没有特意要说给谁听。{/n}“一切都已经澄清了，这是个好消息。”
languages.original_text: "I know. When you're near, I can hear the song your heart is beating, and that song carries my name." {n}With a blissful smile, Jae closes her eyes and says seemingly to no one in particular,{/n} "It's good that everything has been cleared up."

traits.locale_text: “我明白的。当你走来的时候，我能听到你的心在唱歌，它唱的是我的名字。”{n}婕伊带着幸福的微笑，闭上了眼睛。随后，她继续开了口，似乎并没有特意要说给谁听。{/n}“一切都已经澄清了，这是个好消息。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je sais. Quand vous êtes près de moi, j'entends le rythme auquel bat votre cœur, et c'est mon nom qu'il fredonne tout bas. » {n}Avec un sourire béat, Jae ferme les yeux et reprend sans s'adresser à personne en particulier.{/n} « C'est une bonne chose d'avoir clarifié la situation. »
languages.original_text: "I know. When you're near, I can hear the song your heart is beating, and that song carries my name." {n}With a blissful smile, Jae closes her eyes and says seemingly to no one in particular,{/n} "It's good that everything has been cleared up."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais. Quand vous êtes près de moi, j'entends le rythme auquel bat votre cœur, et c'est mon nom qu'il fredonne tout bas. » {n}Avec un sourire béat, Jae ferme les yeux et reprend sans s'adresser à personne en particulier.{/n} « C'est une bonne chose d'avoir clarifié la situation. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Lo sé. Cuando está cerca, oigo la canción de los latidos de su corazón y esa canción lleva mi nombre». {n}Con una sonrisa feliz, Jae cierra los ojos y, sin dirigir sus palabras a nadie en concreto, declara:{/n} «Me alegro de que todo haya quedado claro».
languages.original_text: "I know. When you're near, I can hear the song your heart is beating, and that song carries my name." {n}With a blissful smile, Jae closes her eyes and says seemingly to no one in particular,{/n} "It's good that everything has been cleared up."

traits.locale_text: «Lo sé. Cuando está cerca, oigo la canción de los latidos de su corazón y esa canción lleva mi nombre». {n}Con una sonrisa feliz, Jae cierra los ojos y, sin dirigir sus palabras a nadie en concreto, declara:{/n} «Me alegro de que todo haya quedado claro».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich weiß. Ich kann in Eurer Nähe das Lied Eures Herzschlags hören, und dieses Lied trägt meinen Namen." {n}Mit einem seligen Lächeln schließt Jae die Augen und sagt, anscheinend zu niemand Bestimmten:{/n} "Es ist gut, dass alles geklärt wurde."
languages.original_text: "I know. When you're near, I can hear the song your heart is beating, and that song carries my name." {n}With a blissful smile, Jae closes her eyes and says seemingly to no one in particular,{/n} "It's good that everything has been cleared up."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß. Ich kann in Eurer Nähe das Lied Eures Herzschlags hören, und dieses Lied trägt meinen Namen." {n}Mit einem seligen Lächeln schließt Jae die Augen und sagt, anscheinend zu niemand Bestimmten:{/n} "Es ist gut, dass alles geklärt wurde."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Biliyorum. Yakınımda olduğunda yüreğinin ezgisinin atışını, adımı taşıyan o şarkıyı duyabiliyorum." {n}Jae, huzurlu bir gülümsemeyle gözlerini kapatarak özellikle hitap ettiği kimse yokmuşçasına konuşuyor.{/n} "Her şeyin netlik kazandığını görmek güzel."
languages.original_text: "I know. When you're near, I can hear the song your heart is beating, and that song carries my name." {n}With a blissful smile, Jae closes her eyes and says seemingly to no one in particular,{/n} "It's good that everything has been cleared up."

traits.locale_text: "Biliyorum. Yakınımda olduğunda yüreğinin ezgisinin atışını, adımı taşıyan o şarkıyı duyabiliyorum." {n}Jae, huzurlu bir gülümsemeyle gözlerini kapatarak özellikle hitap ettiği kimse yokmuşçasına konuşuyor.{/n} "Her şeyin netlik kazandığını görmek güzel."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
